node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `stats` ( `stats_id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `stattime` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `numwriteups` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `nume2nodes` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `numusers` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `numlinks` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `xpsum` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `nodehits` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `numedcools` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `numcools` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `numvotes` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`stats_id`), KEY `stattime` (`stattime`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 PACK_KEYS=1
node.title: stats
